import React from "react"; import donut1 from "../images/donut1.jpg"; import donut2 from "../images/donut2.jpg"; import donut3 from "../images/donut3.jpg"; import donut4 from "../images/donut4.jpg"; import backgroundImage from "../images/bg.jpg"; const StarIcon = () => ( ); const EmailIcon = () => ( ); const Home = () => { const donuts = [ { name: "Chocolate Glazed", price: "$2.00", img: donut1, description: "A delicious chocolate-covered donut.", calories: "Indulge in the rich, velvety goodness of our classic Chocolate Glazed Donut. Each bite offers a perfect balance of light, fluffy dough and a smooth, luscious chocolate coating that melts in your mouth. Whether enjoyed with your morning coffee or as an afternoon treat, this donut is a delicious pick-me-up for chocolate lovers. Simple, satisfying, and irresistibly sweet—our Chocolate Glazed Donut is the ultimate comfort food.", }, { name: "Strawberry Sprinkles", price: "$2.50", img: donut2, description: "A classic strawberry donut with sprinkles.", calories: "Treat yourself to the delightful sweetness of our Strawberry Sprinkles Donut. This vibrant, pink-glazed creation is topped with a generous sprinkle of colorful candy for a fun and playful finish. The soft, fluffy dough combined with the fruity glaze offers a refreshing twist on a classic donut, perfect for brightening your day. It's a burst of flavor and color in every bite!", }, { name: "Classic Vanilla Sprinkles", price: "$1.75", img: donut3, description: "Vanilla-flavored donut with colorful sprinkles.", calories: "Our Classic Vanilla Sprinkles Donut is a timeless favorite. Featuring a smooth vanilla glaze that envelops a perfectly baked, golden-brown donut, this treat is finished with a rainbow of sprinkles for a hint of nostalgia and fun. Each bite is light, sweet, and wonderfully satisfying—making it the ideal choice for anyone who loves the simple joy of vanilla paired with a touch of whimsy.", }, { name: "Bavarian Cream Donuts", price: "$2.25", img: donut4, description: "Filled with creamy Bavarian custard.", calories: "270", }, ]; return (

))}
{/* About Us Section */}

Our Story

Delicious Donuts started as a small family bakery in 2000. Today, we're proud to serve the best donuts in town, using only the finest ingredients and time-honored recipes. Our passion for quality and creativity keeps our customers coming back for more!

What Our Customers Say

))}

); }; export default Home;
